actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Commissioner of the Bureau of Reclamation, and the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to assess the potential for development of hydroelectric power at water resources projects under their respective jurisdictions.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army and the Secretary of the Interior to prepare comprehensive plans for the development of hydroelectric power at water resource projects within their respective jurisdictions.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Commissioner of the Bureau of Reclamation, and the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to assess the potential for development of hydroelectric power at water resources projects under their respective jurisdictions.
